configReviewMarkdown.title: Kody Guide: Usage and Configuration
configReviewMarkdown.requestReviewDesc: Ask Kody to review your PR manually by adding a comment with the `@kody start-review` command at the root of your PR.
configReviewMarkdown.provideFeedbackDesc: Help Kody learn and improve by reacting to its comments with a ğŸ‘ for helpful suggestions or a ğŸ‘ if improvements are needed.
configReviewMarkdown.reviewOptionsDesc: The following review options are enabled or disabled:

leadTime.title: Lead Time
leadTime.description: The time it takes for an activity to move from the ${todo} status to the ${done} status.

leadTimeInWip.title: Lead Time in WIP
leadTimeInWip.description: The time it takes for an activity to move from the ${wip} status to the ${done} status.

throughput.title: Throughput
throughput.description: Number of items that reached the ${done} status in the last 7 days.

bugRatio.title: Bug Ratio
bugRatio.description: Number of bugs in WIP relative to the total activities in WIP, in the last 7 days.

leadTimeByColumn.title: Lead Time By Column
leadTimeByColumn.description: Time an item spends in *P75* in each status of your board.

leadTimeForChange.title: Lead Time for Change
leadTimeForChange.description: Average time from the first commit to the PR merge.
